entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING, Mine Centre

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of snow. Low zero. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of snow overnight. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Wind becoming east 20 gusting to 40 after midnight. Low zero. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Wednesday 19 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Snow at times heavy. High zero.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy and local blowing snow. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 50 increasing to 40 gusting to 60 in the afternoon. High zero. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Wednesday 19 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow at times heavy. Temperature steady near minus 3.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy and local blowing snow. Amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind east 40 km/h gusting to 60. Temperature steady near minus 3. Wind chill minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Wednesday 19 April 2023
